description:
GroupDocs Conversion for .NET is a flexible library that enables you to convert over 45 document and image file formats within your .NET application. Documents can be converted either one-by-one on the fly, or added to a conversion queue.
To name a few, you can convert: DOC to PDF, DOC to DOCX, PDF to TIFF, XLS to XLSX, XLS to CSV, PPT to PDF, DOC to TXT, RTF to DOCX, PNG to JPEG and many more.
Note: this download contains a fully working version of the product, however without a license set it will run in evaluation mode with some limitations. To test GroupDocs Annotation for .NET Library without limitations, request a free 30-day temporary license.
releaseNotes:
Improvements

DC-113     Removing redundant dependencies from build process
DC-179     Change Conversion.Net obfuscator to Eazfuscator.NET
DC-196     Implement source for conversion to be a stream
DC-197     Implement store result of conversion in a stream
DC-217     Implement Convert Folder functionality
Bugs Fixed

DC-97     The temp folder is not cleaned up in conversion.net for single conversion
DC-139     Conversion.NET - Error "The system cannot find the file specified" occurs after attempt to conversion HTML file into PDF, JPEG
DC-140     Conversion.NET - Blank page appears after attempt to convert text document into "JPEG"
DC-142     Conversion.NET - The popup is not displayed after attempt to convert file in not supported format
DC-173     Test new Aspose.Slides conversion and rebuild downloadbale Conversion
DC-183     A conversion should be able to be started as async process and also to be canceled after certain period
DC-187     Conversion Progress is wrong for Conversion.Net Demos
DC-188     Remove not needed references from conversion.net
DC-208     Async scheduled conversions sometimes disappears from the scheduled jobs in Conversion.Net
DC-211     Converting doc to docx doesn't work
DC-212     Stream conversion pdf to svg does not work.
DC-214     SaveAs to pdf leaves redundant temp file in temporary folder without cleaning it up
DC-223     Conversion.NET - File "SampleConverted.jpg" is downloaded after conversion into JPG files with more than one page
summary: GroupDocs Conversion for .NET is a flexible library that enables you to convert over 45 document and image file formats within your .NET application. Documents can be converted either one-by-one on the fly, or added to a conversion queue.
title: GroupDocs Conversion for .NET
